content:
That's a great plan! Discussing the project scope and roles with your friends will help ensure that everyone is on the same page and knows what's expected of them. Brainstorming and deciding on materials and supplies will help you all get a sense of what you'll need to bring your vision to life. And testing out techniques and materials beforehand will help you avoid any potential issues and ensure that you're all comfortable with the materials and techniques you'll be using.

Remember to also communicate openly and honestly with each other throughout the process. Collaborative projects can be a lot of fun, but they can also be challenging at times. Make sure to listen to each other's ideas and concerns, and be willing to compromise and adapt as needed.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your project, and I hope it turns out amazing!
